name: Criminal Detective Miami - Solve the Case
name_original: Criminal Detective Miami - Solve the Case
description:
Criminal Detective Miami - Solve the Case is a super addictive brain puzzle, where you will have to find the differences between two pictures each time you play - have fun and prove your sight skills now!

A must-have for all Spot the difference lovers!

Game Features:
- 17 play scenes available.
- Support for iPad devices.
- Hints and boosters which will help you to find all the evidences.
- iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus support!

Have fun solving the cases.
